title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 June 2008 - XWiki
content:
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:45): amelentev: Ping  
amelentev - (21/06/2008 00:47): hi, sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:47): Hi, about http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2490  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:47): You should write a test  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:48): Oh, just seen your comments  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): You could write a selenium test  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): That puts something like this in a document:  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): $xwiki.hasProgrammingRights()  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): $doc.author  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): $doc.contentAuthor  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): $doc.creator  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:49): Then clicks on preview, and asserts that:  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:50): isTextPresent("true")  
amelentev - (21/06/2008 00:50): ok. looks fine  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:50): isTextPresent("Admin Admin Admin")  
amelentev - (21/06/2008 00:50): in WikiEditorTest?  
sdumitriu - (21/06/2008 00:50): Yes  
amelentev - (21/06/2008 00:51): ok  
daning - (21/06/2008 14:04): vmassol: Hi, have a nice weekend.  
vmassol - (21/06/2008 14:45): daning: thanks, you too  
daning - (21/06/2008 19:09): hi, vmassol.  
daning - (21/06/2008 19:17): Hi, I can't commit to sandbox, anyone can help?
